long_description: The Urbanears Bagis earbuds offer a compact, minimalist version of the full Urbanears experience, with an earplug design that provides direct sound and efficient noise reduction. Rubber housing and fabric/thermoplastic elastomer cord with 3.5mm stereo plug help eliminate sound distortions caused by friction. The Urbanears Bagis earbuds snap together, allowing you to carry them around your neck when they're not in use.
short_description: The Urbanears Bagis earbuds offer a compact, minimalist version of the full Urbanears experience, with an earplug design that provides direct sound and efficient noise reduction.
